actions.text: Amendment SA 211 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 78.

Amendment SA 211 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S2936-2937; text: CR S2936) To restore funding for tribal programs and provide necessary additional funding based on recommendations from Indian country
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 211 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 78.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 211 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 78.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 211 proposed by Senator Dorgan.

purpose: To restore funding for tribal programs and provide necessary additional funding based on recommendations from Indian country
